b2362eda-7d1b-4e20-9f57-e54642007248.name: Oxygen Storage
b2362eda-7d1b-4e20-9f57-e54642007248.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

5dbe3dda-b51d-4e33-a49a-5ad31f9bbfd8.name: Oxygen Storage
5dbe3dda-b51d-4e33-a49a-5ad31f9bbfd8.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

86458501-8c40-4f11-8156-9c34bda78f60.name: Oxygen Storage
86458501-8c40-4f11-8156-9c34bda78f60.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

1998ef70-5702-43c6-b252-1a5c8e81d43a.name: Oxygen Storage
1998ef70-5702-43c6-b252-1a5c8e81d43a.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

261d3a63-b6f5-4000-9a61-f35c235cdfb4.name: Oxygen Storage
261d3a63-b6f5-4000-9a61-f35c235cdfb4.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

1dfdc4f1-323f-4a33-bbe4-35315d5bccad.name: High Pain Threshold
1dfdc4f1-323f-4a33-bbe4-35315d5bccad.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

766ecdf3-a441-4eca-afa3-e2f010b1fd73.name: Diffuse
766ecdf3-a441-4eca-afa3-e2f010b1fd73.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

36b49a40-f1d7-4bbd-962e-2abbb6687da3.name: Homogenous
36b49a40-f1d7-4bbd-962e-2abbb6687da3.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

8113d50b-a166-4577-a3c5-894dec9dada9.name: No Blood
8113d50b-a166-4577-a3c5-894dec9dada9.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

8989d1f9-1306-473c-9d68-43a2e2ae9483.name: No Brain
8989d1f9-1306-473c-9d68-43a2e2ae9483.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

e18e101b-8345-4047-a3ec-57065a615478.name: No Eyes
e18e101b-8345-4047-a3ec-57065a615478.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

e224eed4-e91f-4a67-b601-abac2ee34bec.name: No Head
e224eed4-e91f-4a67-b601-abac2ee34bec.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

be579d0e-f8ca-429f-8bc7-7ddacbf56e64.name: No Neck
be579d0e-f8ca-429f-8bc7-7ddacbf56e64.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

81871929-e0f7-4250-8649-a13511c1a7f5.name: No Vitals
81871929-e0f7-4250-8649-a13511c1a7f5.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

f2a1c1bc-8395-43d1-b2e9-c8fcc5301385.name: Unliving
f2a1c1bc-8395-43d1-b2e9-c8fcc5301385.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

b4793912-851d-470f-8b1f-69972b01b44d.name: No Body Heat
b4793912-851d-470f-8b1f-69972b01b44d.notes: Gives +1 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from those who touch you, shake your hand, kiss you, etc.

4a84a21a-b481-4cc3-8901-38d362865b7d.name: No Body Heat
4a84a21a-b481-4cc3-8901-38d362865b7d.notes: Can gain warmth temporarily, such as after feeding for a vampire. Gives +1 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from those who touch you, shake your hand, kiss you, etc.

4c6cc56d-feea-49e3-9693-52d86597e409.name: No Reflection
4c6cc56d-feea-49e3-9693-52d86597e409.notes: Gives +2 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from others who notice you have no reflection

2910fcfb-d4da-465e-894b-e8eced2216ae.name: No Shadow
2910fcfb-d4da-465e-894b-e8eced2216ae.notes: Gives +2 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from others that notice you have no shadow

7836ec1b-bace-44ac-b778-baa9428b4460.name: Pallor
7836ec1b-bace-44ac-b778-baa9428b4460.notes: Gives +2 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from others who can see you without makeup in good light

dc783650-caf2-4fa0-92df-bb2bce2fe5b3.name: Pallor
dc783650-caf2-4fa0-92df-bb2bce2fe5b3.notes: Can gain the flush of life temporarily, such as after feeding for a vampire. Gives +2 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from others who can see you without makeup in good light

080ca12c-6fc5-4e8a-ba03-be832ada982d.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

5a039fa4-3aa1-4532-8aad-d37ffe088dc1.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

1f9808e0-7216-4b97-a38b-79afe9917c58.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

9d3d55b3-c285-469c-ad8b-0781b9c912cc.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

179692cc-6858-4985-843b-525a7aadb6bd.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

4c8e7f4a-be77-4073-920d-64d506e4b7b2.name: No Neck
4c8e7f4a-be77-4073-920d-64d506e4b7b2.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

6fcea2a3-bc3a-4372-9647-4d9172d73009.name: No Vitals
6fcea2a3-bc3a-4372-9647-4d9172d73009.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso
